channel.title: Multiple accounts? Banned on my Mac , Not Pc? Help pl0x
channel.description: hey , well i tried to go on moparscape forums on my mac , and it said i was banned for haveing multiple accounts , when i JUST returned to moparscape after about 1 year , and cant remember any other accounts... and how come i was banned on my mac , and not my pc... help please....

item.title: Multiple accounts? Banned on my Mac , Not Pc? Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:10, topic:311433”][quote author=wales 00 link=topic=407869.msg3011941#msg3011941 date=1256851848]
Trying to be mod, I been here for 4 years and I wouldn’t care less if I was or not.
[/quote]
Date Registered: April 14, 2007, 10:25:19 am
Today’s Date: October 30, 2009, 14:49:20 pm

[/quote]

You seriously have problems :P. Maybe he didn’t have a account or some shit, you just got to call everyone a retard.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Cookies. Delete them (But Dont Delete Fat Cookies )

On internet explorer: tools, internet options, Delete Cookies
On firefox: Tools, options, Privacy, remove individual cookies.
